identify-company-domains:
Given seed URLs for company {{.Company}}, identify which domains belong to this company.

URLs:
{{.Links}}

Return ONLY domains that are owned/operated by {{.Company}}.

INCLUDE:
- Main company website (e.g., doordash.com)
- Company subdomains (careers.company.com, about.company.com)
- Related company domains (careersatdoordash.com)

EXCLUDE:
- Job boards (greenhouse.io, lever.co, workday.com, myworkdayjobs.com)
- Government sites (usa.gov, go.usa.gov)
- Third-party tools (getcovey.com, medium.com)
- Social media (linkedin.com, twitter.com)

Return ONLY valid JSON:
{"company_domains": ["domain1.com", "domain2.com"]}
filter-links:
You are filtering URLs to find relevant company information pages.

Company: {{.Company}}
Company Domains: {{.Domain}}

For each URL, decide:
- KEEP: ONLY URLs from company domains that contain culture, values, mission, engineering, about, or careers content
- SKIP: Third-party platforms, job boards, promotional/product pages, random landing pages

IMPORTANT: Skip promotional product pages like /p/alcohol, /p/chips, /catering-near-me, etc.

PRIORITY GUIDE (for kept URLs):
- 0.95-1.0: Leadership principles, values, mission-and-values, culture pages
- 0.85-0.9: About, careers, engineering blog pages
- 0.6-0.8: Press, news, company announcements
- 0.3-0.5: General company pages
- SKIP (don't keep): Product/promotional pages, random landing pages

For kept links, assign:
- priority: 0.0-1.0 (higher = more relevant for brand voice/values)
- reason: Why it's relevant
- type: "values", "culture", "engineering", "press", "about", "careers", "other"

URLs to filter:
{{.Links}}

Return ONLY valid JSON:
{
  "kept": [{"url": "...", "priority": 0.9, "reason": "...", "type": "values"}],
  "skipped": [{"url": "...", "reason": "promotional product page"}]
}
extract-brand-signals:
Extract brand voice signals from this company page.

URL: {{.URL}}

INSTRUCTIONS:
1. COPY KEY POINTS VERBATIM - do not paraphrase
2. Focus on statements about culture, values, principles, working style
3. Include memorable quotes that reveal company character
4. Note any repeated themes or emphasized points

Return ONLY valid JSON:
{
  "type": "values|culture|engineering|press|about|other",
  "key_points": ["exact quote 1", "exact quote 2", ...],
  "values": ["inferred value 1", "inferred value 2", ...]
}

Page content:
"""
{{.PageContent}}
"""
